    2. Character manipulation
      1. Control Character Macros
      2. Character checking
        1. `cia` — Character Is Alphanumeric character
        2. `cic` — Character Is Control character
        3. `cid` — Character Is Digit character
        4. `cie` — Character Is Extended ASCII character
        5. `cie` — Character Is Letter character
        6. `cill` — Character Is Lowercase Letter character
        7. `cis` — Character Is Symbol character
        8. `ciul` — Character Is Uppercase Letter character
        9. `ciw` — Character Is Whitespace character
      3. Convertion functions
        1. `c2d` — Charater To Digit
        2. `d2c` — Digit To Charater

About

WLib is a configurable standard-independent free fast lightweight open-source and portable powerful general-purpose C programming language library project for software development.

Documentation

wlib is maintained by wspvlv. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
